title: Easy Chicken Fajita Soup Recipe
description: This chicken fajita soup cooks up quickly but delivers slow-cooked flavor, thanks to fire-roasted tomatoes, fajita seasoning, and seasoned black beans.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Chicken Soup Recipes Easy Chicken Fajita Soup 4.7 (365) 261 Reviews 48 Photos This simple chicken fajita soup is made with chicken, peppers, onions, and tomatoes in a deliciously seasoned broth. Serve the soup as-is or top it with tortilla chips. Submitted by Gweb8 Updated on December 15, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 48 48 48 48 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 55 mins Total Time: 1 hr 15 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips 1 (1.27 ounce) packet fajita seasoning 1 red bell pepper, cut into thin strips 1 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips 1 poblano pepper, cut into thin strips 1 large onion, cut into thin strips 1 (15 ounce) can seasoned black beans 1 (14.5 ounce) can fire roasted diced tomatoes 1 (14 ounce) can chicken broth hot sauce to taste salt and pepper to taste Directions Heat oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring only occasionally, until brown, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle fajita seasoning over chicken and stir until well coated. Add bell peppers, poblano pepper, and onion; cook and stir over medium heat until vegetables are soft, about 10 minutes. Pour in black beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, and chicken broth. Increase the heat to high and bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season soup with hot sauce, salt, and pepper before serving. I Made It Print 563 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Chicken Fajita Soup 01 of 48 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 48 Photo by  Chef Troy 12/27/2021 I doubled the recipe and added a dash of cayenne. In keeping with my typical mixed fajita dinner preference at mexican restaurants I used both beef and chicken. Delicious!! 03 of 48 Photo by  Shari Pierre 02/15/2021 Excellent recipe! I added rice to it too make it more filling. Make the rice separately and store separately. Add the rice after you're done cooking the soup to each serving. Warning: if you mix the rice with the soup and let it sit overnight, the rice will soak up the soup juice. (learned this the hard way.. lolol) I'm definitely saving this. 04 of 48 Photo by  Teri L 02/28/2020 05 of 48 Photo by  Teri L 02/28/2020 06 of 48 Photo by  I LIKEBOCON BITS 9907 10/23/2019 07 of 48 Photo by  Alex Ruiz 05/30/2019 08 of 48 Photo by  DeAnna Beauman 01/29/2019 09 of 48 Photo by  DeAnna Beauman 01/29/2019 10 of 48 Photo by  wasupwida 11/08/2018 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Instant Pot® Mexican Chicken Soup 3 Ratings Low-Carb Mexican Chicken Soup 1 Rating Instant Pot Chicken and Vegetable Tortilla Soup 1 Rating Southwest Cheesy Chicken Enchilada Soup 1 Rating Slow Cooker Mexican Chicken Soup 3 Ratings Catherine's Spicy Chicken Soup 2,439 Ratings Southwest Black Bean Chicken Soup 86 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup in the Instant Pot 8 Ratings Caldo Tlalpeño 2 Ratings Rotisserie Chicken Tortilla Soup 8 Ratings Creamy Chicken Tortilla Soup with RO*TEL 1 Rating Slow Cooker Chicken Taco Soup 7,446 Ratings Chipotle Pepper and Chicken Soup 5 Ratings Easy and Tasty Chicken Tortilla Soup 76 Ratings Chicken Tortilla Soup IV 223 Ratings Tortilla and Bean Soup 104 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Gweb8
instructions: Heat oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. Add chicken and cook, stirring only occasionally, until brown, about 10 minutes. Sprinkle fajita seasoning over chicken and stir until well coated. Add bell peppers, poblano pepper, and onion; cook and stir over medium heat until vegetables are soft, about 10 minutes.;Pour in black beans, fire-roasted tomatoes, and chicken broth. Increase the heat to high and bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.;Season soup with hot sauce, salt, and pepper before serving.
